動物用藥品名稱: 貝歐克雞新城病、產卵下降症不活化混合疫苗
業者名稱: 台灣龍馬躍股份有限公司
地址: S.S 234 PER CREMONA, KM 28, 2 27013 CHIGNOLO PO (PAVIA) ITALY
效能(適應症): 蛋雞及種雞：預防新城雞瘟、產卵下降症。
ingredients: 1.NEWCASTLE DISEASE VIRUS, ULSTER 2C STRAIN, INACTIVATED, AT LEAST.....10^9 EID502.EDS`76 VIRUS, 127 MCFERRAN STRAIN, INACTIVATED,AT LEAST  1000HAU3.MINERAL OIL (LIQUID PARAFFIN-MARCOL 52)....0.35 ML4.MANNIDE MONO-OLEATE(AS EMULSIFIER)....0.04 ML5.THIOMERSAL(SODIUM ETHYLMERCURITHIOSALICILATE)....50 MCG
